ARABIC: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوٓا۟ ءَالِهَةً مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ هُمْ يُنشِرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Or have they taken gods out of the earth who can bring the dead to life?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Or have they taken gods from the earth who can raise the dead?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Have they taken earthly gods who are such that they raise up the dead to life?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Have they chosen deities from earth? Can such deities give life to anyone?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Have they appointed from the earth, Gods that create something?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Or have they taken (for worship) gods from the earth who raise the dead
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Or have they taken gods from the earth who raise (the dead).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Or have they taken gods out of the earth who raise the dead?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Or have they chosen gods from the earth who raise the dead?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Have they taken deities from the earth who can bring the dead to life?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Have they taken gods from the earth who raise the deed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Have they taken gods from the earth who raise [the dead]?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Or have they taken (for worship) gods from the earth who can raise (the dead)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Or have they taken (for worship) aliha (gods) from the earth who raise the dead?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Or, have they taken earthly gods who revive the dead?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Or have they taken to themselves gods from the earth who resurrect?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Or have men taken for themselves gods from the earth who resurrect [the dead]?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:21]   Or (am, functions with the meaning of bal, ‘nay’, to effect a transition [in subject-matter]; the hamza is for [rhetorical] denial) have they chosen gods, that are, from the earth, such as stones, gold or silver, who, that is, gods [who], resurrect? who bring the dead back to life? No! Indeed only one who brings the dead back to life can be God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Or have they chosen) or have they, i.e. the people of Mecca, worshipped (gods from the earth) on the earth (who raise the dead) or create human beings?
